Dispatch Functions Framework

Dispatch is a batteries-included open-source enterprise functions framework.

Get Started Documentation GitHub

Production Ready Enterprise Functions

Flexible Faas

Write one function to execute on multiple FaaS including OpenFaaS and Riff.

Multi-User IAM

Integrates with existing OIDC providers and provides robust IAM policies the entire Dispatch API.

Extensible by Design

Integrate easily with external services and event sources via a flexible event driver interface.

Production API Gateway

Dispatch leverages the open source KONG API Gateway to provide a secure and configurable API service.

Dispatch is licensed under the Apache 2 License. Read more here.
